entry.title: EP04-åœ¨çº¿ä»£ç æ··æ·†å·¥å…·è¯¥å¦‚ä½•æ­å»º
entry.content:
æˆ‘å†™äº†ä¸€ä¸ªä»£ç ï¼Œå¯ç›´æ¥æ‰˜ç®¡å¹¶éƒ¨ç½²åˆ°cloudflareå’Œvercel
è¿™æ˜¯GitHubå¼€æºåœ°å€https://github.com/liuyewen111/Code-Obfuscation

åœ¨çº¿ä½“éªŒï¼š
https://hunxiao.280222.us.kg/
https://hunxiao-b81.pages.dev/
https://code-obfuscation-sp68.vercel.app/

1. HTML æ–‡ä»¶ (index.html)

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="zh-CN">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>åœ¨çº¿ä»£ç æ··æ·†å·¥å…·</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
</head>
<body>
    <div class="container">
        <h1>åœ¨çº¿ä»£ç æ··æ·†å·¥å…·</h1>

        <div class="form-group">
            <label for="inputCode">è¯·è¾“å…¥ä»£ç ï¼š</label>
            <textarea id="inputCode" rows="10" placeholder="åœ¨æ­¤è¾“å…¥ä»£ç "></textarea>
        </div>

        <div class="form-group">
            <label for="obfuscationLevel">é€‰æ‹©æ··æ·†ç¨‹åº¦ï¼š</label>
            <select id="obfuscationLevel">
                <option value="low">ä½æ¡£</option>
                <option value="medium">ä¸­æ¡£</option>
                <option value="high">é«˜æ¡£</option>
            </select>
        </div>

        <div class="form-group">
            <button onclick="obfuscateCode()">æ··æ·†ä»£ç </button>
        </div>

        <div class="form-group">
            <label for="outputCode">æ··æ·†åçš„ä»£ç ï¼š</label>
            <textarea id="outputCode" rows="10" readonly placeholder="æ··æ·†åçš„ä»£ç å°†åœ¨æ­¤æ˜¾ç¤º"></textarea>
        </div>

        <button id="copyButton">å¤åˆ¶ä»£ç </button>
    </div>

    <script src="script.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

2. CSS æ–‡ä»¶ (style.css)

body {
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    background-color: #f4f4f9;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    height: 100vh;
}

.container {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    border-radius: 8px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    padding: 20px;
    width: 80%;
    max-width: 800px;
}

h1 {
    text-align: center;
    color: #333;
}

.form-group {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

textarea {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size: 14px;
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
    border-radius: 4px;
}

button {
    padding: 10px 20px;
    background-color: #007BFF;
    color: #fff;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 4px;
    cursor: pointer;
}

button:hover {
    background-color: #0056b3;
}

#copyButton {
    background-color: #28a745;
}

#copyButton:hover {
    background-color: #218838;
}

3. JavaScript æ–‡ä»¶ (script.js)

// æ··æ·†çº§åˆ«é€‰æ‹©
function obfuscateCode() {
    let inputCode = document.getElementById('inputCode').value;
    let level = document.getElementById('obfuscationLevel').value;

    if (!inputCode) {
        alert('è¯·è¾“å…¥ä»£ç ï¼');
        return;
    }

    let obfuscatedCode;
    switch (level) {
        case 'low':
            obfuscatedCode = lowLevelObfuscate(inputCode);
            break;
        case 'medium':
            obfuscatedCode = mediumLevelObfuscate(inputCode);
            break;
        case 'high':
            obfuscatedCode = highLevelObfuscate(inputCode);
            break;
        default:
            obfuscatedCode = inputCode;
    }

    document.getElementById('outputCode').value = obfuscatedCode;
}

// ä½æ¡£æ··æ·†ï¼šç®€å•æ›¿æ¢å˜é‡å
function lowLevelObfuscate(code) {
    const randomString = (length) => {
        let result = '';
        const characters = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789';
        const charactersLength = characters.length;
        for (let i = 0; i < length; i++) {
            result += characters.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charactersLength));
        }
        return result;
    };

    return code.replace(/\b([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)\b/g, (match) => {
        if (match.length > 2) {
            return '_' + randomString(5);
        }
        return match;
    });
}

// ä¸­æ¡£æ··æ·†ï¼šé™¤äº†æ›¿æ¢å˜é‡åï¼Œè¿˜ä¼šå‹ç¼©ä»£ç 
function mediumLevelObfuscate(code) {
    let obfuscatedCode = lowLevelObfuscate(code);
    obfuscatedCode = obfuscatedCode.replace(/\s+/g, ' ').replace(/;\s*/g, ';');
    return obfuscatedCode;
}

// é«˜æ¡£æ··æ·†ï¼šæ›´å¤æ‚çš„ä»£ç æ··æ·†ï¼Œå¯èƒ½åŒ…æ‹¬æ§åˆ¶æµæ··æ·†ç­‰
function highLevelObfuscate(code) {
    let obfuscatedCode = mediumLevelObfuscate(code);
    obfuscatedCode = obfuscatedCode.replace(/\bfunction\b/g, 'f');
    obfuscatedCode = obfuscatedCode.replace(/\bvar\b/g, 'v');
    // å¯ä»¥åŠ å…¥æ›´å¤šé«˜çº§æ··æ·†å¤„ç†
    return obfuscatedCode;
}

// å¤åˆ¶ä»£ç åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿
document.getElementById('copyButton').addEventListener('click', function () {
    const outputCode = document.getElementById('outputCode');
    outputCode.select();
    document.execCommand('copy');
    alert('ä»£ç å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿');
});

ä»£ç è§£é‡Š

  1. HTML éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼š

    • ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥åŸå§‹ä»£ç åï¼Œé€‰æ‹©æ··æ·†çº§åˆ«ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»æŒ‰é’®å³å¯å¾—åˆ°æ··æ·†åçš„ä»£ç ã€‚
    • æä¾›äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæŒ‰é’®æ¥å¤åˆ¶æ··æ·†åçš„ä»£ç åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿ç”¨æˆ·ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

  2. CSS éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼š

    • æä¾›äº†ç®€æ´çš„é¡µé¢æ ·å¼ï¼Œç¡®ä¿å·¥å…·ç•Œé¢ç¾è§‚ä¸”æ˜“ç”¨ã€‚

  3. JavaScript éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼š

    • lowLevelObfuscateï¼šè¿›è¡Œç®€å•çš„å˜é‡åæ›¿æ¢ï¼Œé€šè¿‡éšæœºç”Ÿæˆçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ›¿æ¢å˜é‡ã€‚
    • mediumLevelObfuscateï¼šåœ¨ä½æ¡£æ··æ·†åŸºç¡€ä¸Šï¼Œè¿›ä¸€æ­¥å‹ç¼©ä»£ç ï¼Œå»é™¤å¤šä½™çš„ç©ºæ ¼å’Œæ¢è¡Œã€‚
    • highLevelObfuscateï¼šé‡‡ç”¨æ›´å¤æ‚çš„æ··æ·†æ‰‹æ®µï¼Œå¦‚æ›¿æ¢å‡½æ•°åå’Œå˜é‡åã€‚
    • å¤åˆ¶åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šé€šè¿‡ç‚¹å‡»æŒ‰é’®å°†æ··æ·†åçš„ä»£ç å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿ã€‚

Cloudflare Workers å…¼å®¹æ€§

  • ä»£ç æ··æ·†ä¸»è¦æ˜¯æ›¿æ¢å˜é‡åã€å‡½æ•°åå’Œå»é™¤å¤šä½™çš„ç©ºæ ¼ç­‰ï¼Œä¸ä¼šæ”¹å˜ä»£ç é€»è¾‘ï¼Œå› æ­¤æ··æ·†åä»£ç ä»ç„¶èƒ½å¤Ÿåœ¨ Cloudflare Workers ä¸Šè¿è¡Œã€‚
  • ä¸ºäº†ä¿è¯ Cloudflare Workers ä¸Šä»£ç çš„æ­£ç¡®æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œæ··æ·†çº§åˆ«æœ€å¥½é€‰æ‹© ä½æ¡£æˆ–ä¸­æ¡£ï¼Œé¿å…å¤æ‚çš„æ§åˆ¶æµæ··æ·†ï¼Œè¿™å¯èƒ½ä¼šå¯¼è‡´ Cloudflare Workers ä¸Šçš„æ‰§è¡Œæ•ˆç‡é™ä½æˆ–å‡ºç°ä¸å¯é¢„æœŸçš„é”™è¯¯ã€‚
  • å¦‚æœéœ€è¦åœ¨ Cloudflare Workers ä¸Šéƒ¨ç½²ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†æ··æ·†åçš„ä»£ç éƒ¨ç½²ä¸º Workers è„šæœ¬ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
addEventListener('fetch', event => {
  event.respondWith(handleRequest(event.request))
})

async function handleRequest(request) {
  // åœ¨æ­¤å¤„æ·»åŠ æ··æ·†åçš„ä»£ç 
  return new Response('Hello Worker!', { status: 200 })
}

ç»“è®º

  • æ··æ·†åçš„ä»£ç èƒ½åœ¨ Cloudflare Workers ä¸Šæ‰˜ç®¡å¹¶æ­£å¸¸è¿è¡Œï¼Œå‰ææ˜¯æ··æ·†è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰å½±å“åˆ°æ ¸å¿ƒ API çš„è°ƒç”¨å’Œ Cloudflare Workers ç¯å¢ƒçš„å…¼å®¹æ€§ã€‚
  • ä½¿ç”¨ ä½æ¡£å’Œä¸­æ¡£æ··æ·† æ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒå®‰å…¨çš„é€‰æ‹©ï¼Œé¿å…äº†è¿‡åº¦çš„å¤æ‚åŒ–ï¼Œç¡®ä¿ä»£ç åœ¨ Cloudflare Workers ä¸Šçš„ç¨³å®šæ€§å’Œæ‰§è¡Œæ•ˆç‡ã€‚
